resources.string: The Easy mode is tailored for beginners, offering a practice session lasting approximately 15-20 minutes.
The Medium mode is designed for practice sessions lasting around 10-15 minutes, providing a moderate level of challenge.
For those seeking a more intense practice session, the Hard mode is crafted for sessions ranging from 2 to 10 minutes, providing a challenging experience.

The Easy mode is tailored for beginners, offering a practice session lasting approximately 15-20 minutes.
The Medium mode is designed for practice sessions lasting around 10-15 minutes, providing a moderate level of challenge.
For those seeking a more intense practice session, the Hard mode is crafted for sessions ranging from 2 to 10 minutes, providing a challenging experience.
Study mode is curated for extended study sessions, featuring a playlist spanning approximately 2 hours. Please be patient while it loads, and enjoy your focused study session!

The concept behind the app originated from my intention to develop a tool for my academic courses, particularly those demanding intensive studies such as mathematics, physics, and other sciences. I firmly believe that incorporating melodies, specifically classical songs in my case, can elevate the overall study experience and facilitate stronger connections to learned topics. While I envision the potential for monetization in the future, I recognize that there is a considerable journey ahead to refine and perfect the design before taking that step. \t\n\nRaad Al Tayi
